product_name: Shimano XT FD-M785 Top-Swing 10-Speed Double Front Derailleur - 34.9mm
long_description: This Shimano XT FD-M785 Top-Swing 10-Speed Double front derailleur delivers responsive front shifts for your 2x10 mountain bike drivetrain. Wide link pivot design offers increased rigidity and responsiveness for crisp, clean shifts; cage supplies enhanced clearance. Angled adjustment screws provide easy access for a screwdriver. Clamp fits 34.9mm seat tubes and comes with 31.8 and 28.6mm adapters. Shimano XT FD-M785 Top-Swing 10-Speed Double front derailleur is designed for use with double (2 chainring) cranksets and 10-speed Dyna-Sys (HG-X) chains (sold separately).
short_description: This Shimano XT FD-M785 Top-Swing 10-Speed Double front derailleur delivers responsive front shifts for your 2x10 mountain bike drivetrain.
